New Records: Virat Kohli is one short of equalling Sachin Tendulkar's record of most ODI hundreds.
Shreyas Iyer needs 65 runs in his next three innings to become the third-fastest Indian to 2000 ODI runs.
Key Match Events: India won by 302 runs after a high-scoring match at the Wankhede.
Dilshan Madushanka was dismissed for 5 runs off Ravindra Jadeja's delivery.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage.
Sri Lanka's batting order was discussed by their head coach Chris Silverwood.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed confidence in the team's performance.
Sri Lanka's struggles were highlighted as they face elimination.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wankhede pitch is known for high-scoring games.
Maheesh Theekshana is three short of 50 ODI wickets.
Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24.
